content: Hey all! I reported a panic in cargo with resolver = "2" 10 days ago, and from the folks I talked too, it seemed like a pretty critical issue that should be fixed as resolver = "2" is in beta. The bug report was originally with resolver = "1" and the panic is a little obscure/buried in the thread, so I wanted to make sure y'all didn't miss it! Apologies if you're aware already, just isn't a lot of activity on the thread. https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/9216
